Constructor Summary

          Makes a new snake
 
Method Summary
 int eat(Food food)
          Eats the food and fills "the stomach" of the snake (sizeToGrow) and gives back the nutritiveValue of the food waring: the food will not be removed here from the gameField
 boolean isAt(Point position)
          Check if the body of the snake is at the given position head will not be checked!

          Gives the next position the snake is going to

          Moves the snake to the given position
 void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
          Paints the snake and it's limbs on the given Graphics2D g
 void setHeading(Heading heading)
          Sets the heading of the snake checks if this heading is legal

isAt

public boolean isAt(Point position)
Check if the body of the snake is at the given position head will not be checked!

Parameters:

Returns:
true if the snake is at this position, false if not

eat

public int eat(Food food)
Eats the food and fills "the stomach" of the snake (sizeToGrow) and gives back the nutritiveValue of the food waring: the food will not be removed here from the gameField

Parameters:

Returns:
the nutritive Value of the food
